price: 62. Satana abungisa bino te mpo azali monguna ya polele тропа bino.
arabic: وَلَا يَصُدَّنَّكُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walā yaṣuddannakumu al-shayṭānu innahu lakum ʿaduwwun mubīnun
